ci_support_linux_64_ruby2.5.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '9'
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
ruby:
- '2.5'
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - cdt_name
  - docker_image

about.summary: Cool.io provides a high performance event framework for Ruby which uses the libev C library

script: gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies cool.io-1.7.1.gem&& make -C PREFIX/lib/ruby/gems/2.5.0/gems/cool.io-1.7.1/ext/cool.io clean&& make -C PREFIX/lib/ruby/gems/2.5.0/gems/cool.io-1.7.1/ext/iobuffer clean&& gem unpack cool.io-1.7.1.gem
